Total : $69.99

Step 1

Before trying any of the below it is important to inform your bank that you are going to make online purchase from "www.realtests.com" for the "$69.99" and ask the bank to authorize the transaction next time you are going to try. This is a very common problem which can be solved with one phone call to bank and mostly resolves the issue.

Please verify your information before submitting, for typographical errors.

Step 2

Credit and Debit Card Options

Option 1

Try your Card through a Secondary Bank. You will be redirected to Secondary Bank page for making the payment and then returned here to receive/download your products. This option is only valid for Visa, Mastercard and American Express cards.

Note: The charges on your Credit/Debit Card Statement will appear as paid to 'Learning Tools' - our partner in accepting payments.

Option 2

Go to Payment Page and try your CC details again. Since you have informed the bank it should work fine. You can pay using the following credit or debit cards: Visa, Mastercard, Diners Club, American Express, Maestro and JCB cards.
